name: Bit by Bit
description:
Bit by Bit is a challenging pixel art platformer game. You will start playing with the beauty of 2bit style then it will evolve to 8bit and 16bit style!

The game has 6 levels. You've 5 lives at the beginning. You will lose each one of them when you die.  After you spend all of your lives then you have to go all the way back!

CONTROLS:

Left: A (also left arrow)
Right: D (also right arrow)
Jump: SPACE
Double Jump: DOUBLE SPACE (you need to click X2 time immediately)

USED ASSETS:

Gigakoop - Intro (In game music)

CREW:

Oğuzhan BAYLAN as Unity Game Developer

Yasin GÜMÜŞTAŞ as Pixel Artist

...And special thanks to Ecem Tamer

Enjoy!
